name: Gemini Experimental 1206
description: Experimental model with 2M+ token context achieving highest LMArena score. Exceptional performance on coding, math, and complex reasoning tasks.
notes: EXPERIMENTAL - Free via Google AI Studio and API. Highest Arena Score (1379) on LMArena. Available to Gemini Advanced subscribers. Enhanced RL processes. May lack real-time info and some features. Performance inconsistencies possible.
